message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $12000. To start our negotiation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $15000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response.
